text:
February 2, 1961
Mr. Robert £• Underwood, Jr.
Network Manager
NAEB Headquarter#
14 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Bobi
Just a comment on your January 20
announcement concerning changes in net¬
work fees—this move was long overdue
and I applaud it.
The network is worth the cost and
then some.
Best wishes.
Sincerely,
R. Edwin Browne
Director
REBila
CC: Mr. Harold Hill
Mr. Bill Harley
